attributes.action: gradually phase in the metric system on our roads in time for the 2012 olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Btritian is on of the only counries in the world outside america that still uses the imperial system on roads. A gradual change over to the metric system in time for the 2012 olympics would cut down confusion in the large amout of foreign drivers that are likeley to arrive.

i prepose that the speed limits be set as:
30MPH becomes 50Kph
40MPH becoms 65Kph
50MPH becomes 80Kph
60MPH becomes 95Kph
70MPH becomes 120Kph (75MPH approx)

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
